HERO.NAME: HEY! I AM AGNES
HERO.DESCRIPTION: I develop frontend web applications in TypeScript-based Angular framework. I build backend apps with RESTful APIs in java-maven-spring boot. The PostgreSQL database is what I use for data storage.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: MY WORK
PORTFOLIO.SUBTITLE: LATEST PROJECTS
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION:
Earlier I began to use the Thymeleaf html-springboot integrated server-side view, later I switched to using Angular framework in separated frontend webapplications. In the meantime, in addition to maintaining XML-based spring applications with my software developments, I developed java-maven-spring boot programs using Lombok, and apache-poi to write out postgres-data into excel spreadsheets.
Qualification: IT engineer BSc degree at Dennis Gabor College.
